metadata.description: Dynamic tab structure for SBI Apartment Property Details template

sections.description: Comprehensive address and property location information
Area measurements and carpet area details

tabs.description: Basic apartment information and comprehensive address details

sections.description: Building details, age, construction type, and infrastructure facilities
Flat configuration, area measurements, and utility fittings

tabs.description: Detailed assessment of apartment characteristics and marketability factors

sections.description: Location advantages, market demand, and rental potential assessment
Building age assessment and depreciation calculations
Component-wise valuation breakdown and total calculations

tabs.description: Final valuation summary with market, realizable, and distress values
